summary: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.
cast: Jodie Whittaker|John Boyega|Alex Esmail|Leeon Jones|Franz Drameh|Simon Howard|Maggie McCarthy|Danielle Vitalis|Paige Meade|Gina Antwi|Natasha Jonas|Sammy Williams|Michael Ajao|Luke Treadaway|Flaminia Cinque|Nick Frost|Jumayn Hunter|Selom Awadzi|Adam Buxton|Haneen Hammou|Jacey Salles|Yvonne D'Alpra|Karl Collins|Joey Ansah|Adam Leese|Lee Long|Jermaine Smith|Dylan Charles|David Cann|Paisley Billings|Paul Chiedozie|Lee Nicholas Harris|Philip Harvey|Chris Mansfield|Stephanie Street|Pascoe Willis|Chris Wilson
title: Attack the Block
